  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. La bella i la bèstia</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Beauty and the Beast</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Schönheit und das Tier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Beauté et la bête</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Beleza e a besta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Bellezza e la bestia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Ομορφιά και το κτήνος</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta de les rondalles i les classifica en: meravelloses, d'animals i de costums. S'hi estudien les rondalles a la Renaixença, l'estructura i els elements de la rondalla. Textos d'Apuleu -Cupido i Psique-, Pau Bertran -El passatger devot-, Antoni M. Alcover -Rondalles mallorquines- i Andreu Ferrer -Sa cabra i es cabrit-. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on folktales and their classification as marvellous, about animals, or about customs. Renaissance folktales are studied, together with their structure and parts. Sample texts from Apuleius' "Cupid and Psyche", Pau Bertran's "The Devout Wayfarer", Antoni M. Alcover's "Majorcan Folktales", and Andreu Ferrer's "The Goat and the Kid". Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">autor</string>
            <string language="en">author</string>
            <string language="es">autor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">text literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary text</string>
            <string language="es">texto literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf folktales und ihrer 
Klassifikation, wie erstaunlich, über Tiere oder über Gewohnheiten. 
Renaissance folktales werden, zusammen mit ihrer Struktur und 
Teilen studiert. Prüfen Sie Texte Apuleius' "vom Amor und von 
der Psyche", Pau Bertrans "das fromme Wayfarer", Antoni M. Alcovers 
"Majorcan Folktales" und Andreu Ferrers "die Ziege und das Zicklein". 
Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur des folktales et leur 
classification comme merveilleuse, au sujet des animaux, ou au sujet 
des coutumes. Des folktales de la Renaissance sont étudiés, 
ainsi que leur structure et pièces. Échantillonnez les textes 
du "cupidon et psyche" d'Apuleius, le Wayfarer dévot de Pau Bertran 
"", "Majorcan Folktales" d'Antoni M. Alcover's, et la chèvre d'Andreu
Ferrer "et le gosse". Des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont
également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo em folktales e em sua 
classificação como maravilhosa, sobre animais, ou sobre costumes. 
Os folktales do renascimento são estudados, junto com suas 
estrutura e peças. Prove textos do "cupid e do psyche" de 
Apuleius', o Wayfarer devout de Pau Bertran "", "Majorcan Folktales" 
de Antoni M. Alcover, e a cabra de Andreu Ferrer "e o miúdo". 
As atividades do self-assessment são incluídas também para a 
prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sui folktales e sulla loro 
classificazione come meravigliosa, circa gli animali, o circa le 
abitudini. I folktales di rinascita sono studiati, insieme alla 
loro struttura e parti. Provi i testi "dal cupid e dallo psyche"
del Apuleius, il Wayfarer devout de Pau Bertran "", "Majorcan 
Folktales" di Antoni M. Alcover e la capra di Andreu Ferrer "ed il 
capretto". Le attività di valutazione di se stesso egualmente 
sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στα folktales και 
την ταξινόμησή τους όπως θαυμάσια, για τα ζώα, ή για το 
τελωνείο. Η αναγέννηση folktales μελετάται, μαζί με τη 
δομή και τα μέρη τους. Κείμενα δείγματα από τη "Cupid 
και ψυχή" Apuleius, οδοιπόρος του Πάου Bertran "ο 
αφοσιωμένοσ", Antoni M. alcover "μαγιορκινό Folktales", 
και αίγα Andreu Ferrer "η και το κατσίκι". Οι 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την 
πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
